org.apache.pig

Interface StoreResources

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroStorage, AvroStorage, HBaseStorage, JsonStorage, OrcStorage, TrevniStorage

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface StoreResources
    This interface allow StoreFunc to specify resources needed in distributed cache. The resources can be on dfs (getCacheFiles) or locally (getShipFiles)
    Since:
    Pig 0.14

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getCacheFiles()
      Allow a StoreFunc to specify a list of files it would like placed in the distributed cache.
      List<String> getShipFiles()
      Allow a StoreFunc to specify a list of files located locally and would like to ship to backend (through distributed cache).

    • Method Detail

      • getCacheFiles

        List<String> getCacheFiles()
        Allow a StoreFunc to specify a list of files it would like placed in the distributed cache. The default implementation returns null.
        Returns:
        A list of files

      • getShipFiles

        List<String> getShipFiles()
        Allow a StoreFunc to specify a list of files located locally and would like to ship to backend (through distributed cache). Check for FuncUtils for utility function to facilitate it The default implementation returns null.
        Returns:
        A list of files
